howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1Text: Pick a recipe you like in the list.
howItWorks.step2Text: Actually make the recipe you found using our engine. It's simple, intuitive and elegant. We're in 2016, after all!
howItWorks.step3Text: We don't have to guide you through this step. Go on, enjoy it; you deserve it!

features.feature1Description: elee.menu is multi-plaform, so you can follow your recipe on any device you want wherever you want.
features.feature2Description: Ingredient quantities are specified directly in the step, in the measure unit your prefer. No need to look for information elsewhere anymore! Furthermore, ingredients that have already been used are checked from the ingredient list.
features.feature3Description: Lorsqu'un temps est requis, vous pouvez activer un chronomètre directement dans l'étape. Vous pouvez même ajouter un chronomètre manuellement, selon vos besoins! Lorsque le temps est écoulé, une alerte vous l'indique, quoi que vous soyez en train de faire.

moar.title: More will come!
moar.description: Keep in mind that this is only a limited demo, to see how we can improve the engine. much more features will come, such as:
moar.nextFeatures2: Recipe search, searching through all major foodie websites
moar.nextFeatures4: Recipe saving and editing in your personal cookbook
moar.nextFeatures5: Recipe suggestions based on your preferences and achievements

description.title: What?
description.description1: It is still difficult nowadays to follow a recipe without making mistakes.
description.description3: elee.menu is a simple and elegant recipe tool that enables you to follow a recipe without making mistakes in the process.
